Story.title: Simon: School Genius
Story.Description: Simon's always been in demand: from loading test answers into your phone to humiliating teachers online, if you need something hacked, you go to him. But with prom night approaching, he wonders: does anyone really care? Or do they just use him for his sweet, sweet brain? It's time to find out if Simon can hack RL (real life, newbs).

GoalDescription.words: Simon is hoping that this last week of High School will be one of the best weeks of his life. We don't always get what we wish for.

taskNaturalLanguage.words: Make at least two generally negative things happen to Simon ###SIMON###

TidBit.text: Everyone's talking about Simon's embarrassing day.
It seems people are starting to pity Simon.
Simon might be the saddest excuse at the school.

GoalDescription.words: Simon wants some real, honest friendships. Or at least as real as friendships get in high school. And he wants a lot of them. Four sounds nice.

taskNaturalLanguage.words: Make Simon ###SIMON### popular ###POPULAR### by getting him four friends ###FRIENDS###

TidBit.text: Students are finding that maybe Simon isn't just an information kiosk after all.
Kids are starting to think Simon may actually be cool!
Simon may be closer to popularity than he thought.

GoalDescription.words: Simon has always been intrigued by the concept of the Frenemy. Time to learn about this complex inter-social relationship through practical application.

taskNaturalLanguage.words: Have Simon ###SIMON### become enemies ###ENEMIES### with his target

TidBit.text: Simon's relationships are getting a little complex.
Simon trying out the maxim: keep your friends close, and your enemies closer.

GoalDescription.words: It gets a little lonely working on AP Calculus homework by yourself every night. Get Simon a study buddy.

taskNaturalLanguage.words: Get Simon ###SIMON### a date ###DATING### with someone.

TidBit.text: Someone may finally be warming up to Simon!
It seems Simon is figuring out how to bring the love.
Who'd have guessed that Simon would start hacking the hearts of his classmates?

GoalDescription.words: Simon hasn't really ever dated anyone before. He's gotta make up for lost time!

TidBit.text: It seems Simon's stacking up the lovers.
It looks like Simon might have bitten off more than he could chew.
Simon may just have a little too much on his plate!

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Well, this is no surprise. Guess it's just you and me again, little phone.
Maybe if I just keep you out like this, people will think I'm texting with someone really cool.
I don't get it, phone. I tried so hard to shake things up, really be somebody... but nothing worked.
I guess people are more complicated than I thought. Where's the man page for life, phone?
Well, forget them. Who cares about being popular! Or attractive! I'm the smartest kid in school!
What's that phone? Oh. You're absolutely right. I don't need them at all. Not in the slightest.
You'll never abandon me, will you phone? And I'll never abandon you. Well, not until your upgrade comes out next year, at least.
*sigh*... guess I'll go home and blog about this.
Hey dog, what's happening? Man, this prom is totally %positiveadj%, huh?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Definitely, %buddy%! Glad you could make it out.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: %o%! %buddy%! Just drinking some punch, dancing a little - you know, keeping it real!
Man, I'm so glad to have friends like you guys! Last week I wasn't sure I had any real friends at all... but now I know I do.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: For sure, man! You made us remember how cool you are this week.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Thanks guys! Hey, the dance floor looks kind of empty. Let's go tear it up and show these wallflowers how to party!

Instantiation.name: Goal B - A Night for Lovers

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: %i%, %sweetie%. Thanks so much for being my Prom date! This night has been totally %positiveadj%!

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Of course, %sweetie%. Anything for you.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: You and your big brain are so adorable. Just too cute!

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: I can't believe this. I'm at my senior prom with %r% and %pron(r,he/she)% thinks I'm cute! My mom was wrong. Magic IS real!
Ready to dance, %sweetie%?
Say... %r%. I have something I need to tell you.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: What is it, %sweetie%?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: I... I think... I love you.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Really? Oh, Simon... I... I never thought I would, but... I think I love you too.
Hey Simon, ready for that dance you promised me?
I'm so happy I get to be your prom date, %sweetie%.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: It's be my pleasure, hot stuff. Just take my arm and...

LineOfDialogue.otherLine: Ummm, what are *you* doing with *my* Simon! Back off, %r%!

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: What do you mean, *your* Simon? He's *my* boyfriend, %o%!

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Uh, hey everyone, let's just chill out here. I may have overclocked things a bit, but there's no need for fighting...

LineOfDialogue.otherLine: You! You *cheated* on me!? How could you!

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: I can't believe this! Who do you think you are?

LineOfDialogue.otherLine: For someone so smart, you really can be stupid, Simon.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: I'm not stupid! I calculated there was only a 23% chance a confrontation of this kind would occur! THOSE ARE ACCEPTABLE ODDS!

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Well you struck out, brainiac. You may be cute, but you're not *that* cute.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Well, well, well, %r%. So we meet again, for the last time.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Last time? You wish. I have a feeling you'll keep being a thorn in my side for a long time.
I have forseen it!

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: I don't really get you, %r%. Sometimes you seem like a %gender(r,cool dude,nice girl)%, then other times you make me want to kill you.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Simon, Simon, Simon. Don't you get it?
People are too complicated to fit in your neat little boxes. You can't do a database query on relationships.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Really? Because that sounds pretty simple. It's probably something like SELECT * FROM acquaintances WHERE annoying LESSTHAN...

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: OMG shut up. You're such a geek. People are staring!
My point is that sometimes relationships between people get complex.
But that's what makes being human interesting. It's all part of the great adventure of life. You see?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Sorry, what did you say? I was 'checking in from Da Prom.'

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: I hate you, %buddy%.
Hey there, Simon... How are you holding up?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Not so great, I guess.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Yeah... I heard about everything that happened...
I can't help feeling bad for you. No one deserves what you've been through.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: It's not my fault! It all happened so fast.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Yeah, they were just real jerks. Don't worry about them, huh?
Say, wanna hang out with me? Maybe dance or something?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Sure, that'd be really cool %r%! You're really nice.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: No problem. I mean, I'm just glad I'm not you!

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: ...thanks, I guess.
